# Statements Expressions Operators Docs

- [Equality Comparisons](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/equality-comparisons.md): Learn about equality comparisons. See descriptions of 'value equality' and 'reference equality', and view additional resources.
- [Expression-bodied members](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/expression-bodied-members.md): Learn about expression-bodied members. See code examples that use expression body definition for properties, constructors, finalizers, and more.
- [How to define value equality for a class or struct](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/how-to-define-value-equality-for-a-type.md): Learn how to define value equality for a class or struct. See code examples and view available resources.
- [How to test for reference equality (Identity)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/how-to-test-for-reference-equality-identity.md): Learn how to test for reference equality (Identity). See a code example and view additional available resources.
- [Statements](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/csharp/programming-guide/statements-expressions-operators/statements.md): Learn about statements in C# programming. See a list of statement types, and view code examples and additional resources.
